snippet: Reverberations from a malfunction Friday at a chronically troubled facility extended into continental Europe as well as some trans-Atlantic flights.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and NICOLA CLARK

lead_paragraph: Reverberations from a malfunction Friday at a chronically troubled facility extended into continental Europe as well as some trans-Atlantic flights.

headline.main: London Air Traffic Glitch Closes Airspace and Disrupts Flights
headline.print_headline: London Air Traffic Glitch Closes Airspace and Disrupts Flights
